_comment3: Copy this to remote_config.json and edit the values
_note_bot_host: IP address of your Discord bot machine on local network
_note_bot_port: Must match REMOTE_API_PORT in bot's .env file
_note_auth_token: Must match REMOTE_API_TOKEN in bot's .env file
_note_training_interval: How often to check for training opportunities
_note_min_messages: Minimum new messages before training starts
_note_gpu_type: rocm (best for RX 5700 XT), directml (fallback), cpu (slow)
_note_max_epochs: Number of training epochs (10 is good default)
_note_upload: Upload trained model back to Discord bot
_note_training_timeout: Max training time in seconds (2 hours)
_note_retry_attempts: Number of retry attempts on API failures
_note_log_level: Logging level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR
_note_backup_models: Keep local backup of trained models
_note_cleanup_data: Delete training data after successful training
